text: "If it had been I," thought Kitty, catching the words, "and from myself far be it!"

passages.fragment: If it had been I , '' thought Kitty ,
passages.full_quote: "<used>If it had been I," thought Kitty</used>, "how proud I should have been"

"That's all splend<used>id," thought Kitty, catching the words, "a</used>ll that's just as it should be," and a smile of happiness, unconsciously reflected in everyone who looked at her, beamed on her radiant face

passages.fragment: the words , `` and from myself far be it !
passages.full_quote: "May you and me do our duty, both on us, by one and another, and by them which your liberal present -- have-conweyed -- to be -- for the satisfaction of mind-of -- them as never --" here Joe showed that he felt he had fallen into frightful difficulties, until he triumphantly rescued himself with <used>the words, "and from myself far be it</used>!"
